QuestData.Title: Revelations
QuestData.Description: The prisoner is being kept upstairs, $n. It will be difficult to get information from him, but even the slightest detail about their location will help.$b$bThe elders have begun questioning him already. With their help we should be able to figure out our next move.$b$bGo speak with him and see if he has any useful information.
QuestData.CompletionText: What did the prisoner have to say?
QuestData.RewardText: We cannot dwell on this setback, $n. Prophet Khar'zul must be dealt with.$b$bEvery member of the Thunder King's forces we are able to destroy brings us one step closer to victory.
